products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Specialized grades for packaging, printing & industrial applications

duplexBoard.name: Duplex Board
duplexBoard.short: Premium grey and white back grades for FMCG, cosmetics, and pharmaceutical packaging
duplexBoard.description: Premium quality duplex board with grey or white back. Ideal for FMCG packaging, cosmetics boxes, pharmaceutical cartons, and electronics packaging. Available in GC1, GC2, and GD2 grades.

testlinerFluting.name: Testliner & Fluting
testlinerFluting.short: Recycled containerboard for corrugated applications with consistent quality and competitive pricing
testlinerFluting.description: Recycled containerboard in grades TL1, TL2, TL3, and Fluting Medium. Perfect for e-commerce packaging, industrial boxes, and agricultural packaging. Sustainable choice with 60-100% recycled content.

kraftlinerWhiteTop.name: Kraftliner & White Top
kraftlinerWhiteTop.short: Virgin fiber linerboard with superior strength and high burst index for demanding applications
kraftlinerWhiteTop.description: Virgin fiber kraftliner and white top linerboard with exceptional strength. High burst index (3.5-5.5 kPa·m²/g) for heavy-duty, export, and premium packaging applications.

triplexBoard.name: TRİPLEXBOARD
triplexBoard.short: High performance multi-ply recycled board for packaging
triplexBoard.description: Premium quality triplex board with white top and grey back. Excellent stiffness and printability for packaging solutions. Ideal for FMCG, food packaging, and industrial cartons. Cost-effective sustainable choice.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Paper Market World, we strive to bridge the gap between manufacturers and consumers of paper products globally. Our mission is to provide seamless, efficient, and transparent trading solutions that empower businesses to thrive.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the world's leading digital platform for paper trading, setting the standard for quality, reliability, and innovation in the industry.
